driver:
@@DRVNAME@@ http://gimp-print.sourceforge.net/ gs -q -dSAFER -dNOPAUSE -dBATCH -sDEVICE=stp %A%Z -sOutputFile=- - STP supports a wide variety of Epson Stylus, HP DeskJet and LaserJet, and Canon BubbleJet printers, with the primary goal being uncompromising quality. Epson Stylus printers in particular are supported in all resolutions and modes, and the latest printers are capable of producing prints that rival photographic prints in quality. This package also offers much faster printing for high quality text and presentation graphics when required.

The execution information currently here corresponds to driver version @@STPVER@@.

To get a pre-patched/pre-compiled GNU-GhostScript 5.50 with this driver (version 4.0.4) download sources and binaries of ESP GhostScript. @@STPRINTERS@@
